name: Baked Chicken Breast
details: Juicy and flavorful baked chicken breast that's perfect for a weeknight dinner. Made with simple ingredients and ready in under an hour.

name: Raspberry Tartlet
details: A delicate and sweet raspberry tartlet made with a flaky crust and fresh raspberry filling. The perfect dessert for any occasion.

name: Ultimate Cheese Burger
details: A classic cheeseburger made with high-quality beef, gooey melted cheese, and all the fixings. Satisfy your cravings with this ultimate comfort food.
